name: Slime Smasher
description:
Smash the slimes!

Press the left and right, A and D, or mouse buttons alternatingly as fast as you can. Can you defeat the nearly invincible boss slime? Good luck!

Post-Compo version - Please play the original PC version if you are rating on the Ludum Dare site, thanks!

http://ludumdare.com/compo/ludum-dare-34/?action=preview&uid=27481

V0.3 -
Added new slime + boss slime
New game over screen
Particle effects on smash
Fixed bug with keyboard control

V0.2 -
Slightly harder difficulty
"Music"
